abstract: Editorial expresses skepticism that Syrian truce brokered by United States and Russia will be successful, largely because Pres Vladimir V Putin cannot be trusted and his sole goal is to keep Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad in power; warns Putin that critical role his nation plays in Syrian conflict will have little influence over way world views Russian power games in Europe and Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The Russian president, eager to restore glory to his nation, holds many of the cards in Syria but should not confuse that for respect for his power.

headline.main: Relying Again on an Unreliable Mr. Putin
headline.print_headline: Relying Again on an Unreliable Mr. Putin

snippet: The Russian president, eager to restore glory to his nation, holds many of the cards in Syria but should not confuse that for respect for his power.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
